Reviews.Title: No problem here
Reviews.Author: D. Craine
Reviews.Content: This adapter cable worked just fine that the quality seems to be just fine. I have used several of these.

Reviews.Title: Didn't work as promised.
Reviews.Author: J. Clouse
Reviews.Content: Needed to couple a birdhouse camera to my tv. This was all that was available. Wish there were a female version. It didn't work.

Reviews.Title: din piin
Reviews.Author: david
Reviews.Content: the 6 pin cable  coupler arrived in a timely order was packed safely and works perfectly will be ordering again from this company. thank you amazon.

ProductInfo.Features:
Lorex Cva6933R RCA To 6-Pin DIN Coupler
Brand: Lorex
LORCVA6933R
Connects A Bnc Or RCA-Terminated Camera To A Lorex(R) 6-Pin DIN Observation System
Includes 1 Bnc-Female To RCA-Male Connector
